summary:
I'm a Project Manager experienced in leading Software development teams, Team Climate & Operations tasks.
I got my International Umpire license from FISA in 2013, becoming the youngest Rowing Umpire in the world.
I love to take challenges and learn new skills and languages and mixed both of my background skills in Sports and Software Management, making the perfect match for it.

certifications.name: Functions for Manipulating Data in PostgreSQL
PostgreSQL Summary Stats and Window Functions
Curso de Entrenamiento Hipopresivo para Entrenamiento Funcional
Curso completo de Ingles de 6 años de duración.

profile_positions.description:
In 2013, i get my FISA license, becoming the Youngest Internatioinal Rowing Umpire.
My carreer as Umpire started in 2009 as national Umpire, years later in 2012 i got my South American Umpire license, and finally, in 2013 i got my International Umpire license in Rio de Janeiro Brasil.
profile_positions.title: International Rowing Umpire

profile_positions.description: I had my participation as an NTO Umpire for the World Rowing Championship 2022

profile_positions.description:
I've worked with a team of 5 bakers, 2 owners, and 3 chefs in one of the biggest bakeries in the region. My main role was to grow their sell-by managing their website and social media.
I prioritized the job, assigning tasks to different chefs, depending on their expertise, aligning their story and finding a cohesive way of showing appealing content to the audience.
Sales grew up 60% in the first trimester thanks to the work I've done.
profile_positions.title: Project Managment in Social Media

profile_positions.description:
I worked with a team of 2 owners, 4 Personal Training coaches, and 2 psychologists to help people to keep their training routines in a virtual platform called Progressive.
My main role was to understand the client's needs, assign them to a Personal Training coach, and plan all meetings between them until the matching was successful.
I’ve managed program deadlines depending on each client's needs and I had constant communication with them the whole time.
Tools: Google suite, Microsoft Office suite, Trello, Whatsapp, LinkedIn, YouTube
profile_positions.title: Lead Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
I worked with a team of 2 Project Managers, 2 Product Owners, 1 Tech Lead, 2 Designers, and 4 developers.
My main role was to coordinate daily meetings with developers, and weekly with the Tech Lead and Product owners so we could be in fluent communication. At the same time, I was in charge of following updates, plans and anticipating possible delays to ensure projects completion.
Main Projects:

Recipes Web Application for Ajinomoto:  I worked with a multicultural team, and with different time zones (Argentina, Japan, USA, Belgium), leading the development of a recipes app for a Japan Company.

E-commerce website Maxim Store : The challenge was to help a very traditional client to move from an online catalog to an ecommerce page during the pandemic. My role was to translate the developers requirements to the client and keep fluent communication.

Online training Web platform Sport Club: In this project I lead a team of 5 developers, creating a live platform of online GYM classes from scratch in less than a month.
I used tools like Google suite, Microsoft Office suite, Trello, Slack, Pivotal Tracker

- October 2019 - May 2020: I&CO https://iandco.com/ (UMAMI AI Project)
- November 2019: Maxim Store https://maximstore.ar/
- April 2020: Sport Club https://online.sportclub.com.ar/
profile_positions.title: Junior Project Lead

profile_positions.description: Mi responsabilidad es preparar a mis alumnas, trabajando sus capacidades condicionales para que se encuentran optimas para la competencia, previniendo lesiones deportivas.
profile_positions.title: Preparadora Física
